title: The Salad Box
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, International, Organic, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Organic kitchen counter within Elements Natural Foods market. Offering salads, acai bowls, breakfast, cold pressed juices, smoothies, coffee and tea. Vegan faux chicken is available in salads. Vegan caesar salad is made with house-made vegan parmesan. Separate area dedicated to preparing vegan food.
